title: Area/Vol: region bounded by cubic and trig functions

content.question: Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the graphs of f(x) = 8x3 and g(x) = sin(πx), as shown in the figure above. (a) Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x = 1/2.

frqParts.text: Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the graphs of f(x) = 8x3 and g(x) = sin(πx), as shown in the figure above. (a) Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x = 1/2.
(c) Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression for the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y = 1.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
